text: Bibi Ferreira (born Abigail Izquierdo Ferreira; 1 June 1922 - 13 February 2019) was a Brazilian actress. In 1962, she tested for a part in the Brazilian production of My Fair Lady. She then received leads in Hello Dolly and Man of La Mancha. In 2016, she appeared in New York City in “Bibi Times Four.” Feffeira died on 13 February 2019 at her apartment in Rio de Janeiro from heart failure at the age of 96.Bibi Ferreira, diva dos musicais brasileiros, morre aos 96 anos ==References== ==Other websites== * *Bibi Ferreira on Forbes.com Category:2019 deaths Category:1922 births Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian singers Category:Brazilian stage actors Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro
title: Bibi Ferreira
